statements: UPDATE financial_dashboard SET account_balance = 1500.50 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE financial_dashboard SET last_updated = NOW(), account_name = 'Savings Account' WHERE account_id = 2;
UPDATE financial_dashboard SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE financial_dashboard SET last_updated = '2022-03-15', account_balance = 5000 WHERE account_id = 200;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 1500.50 WHERE account_id = 1001;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 500.75, transaction_type = 'Deposit' WHERE transaction_id = 2001;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = 5000.00, account_name = 'Savings Account' WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_type = 'Deposit', amount = 1000.00, transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = 201;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 1500.00 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.50, transaction_date = '2022-09-15 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance - 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = transaction_amount + 500, transaction_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 54321;

UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 500 WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 1000 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 100.00 WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE accounts_history SET balance = 1500.00, transaction_id = 456 WHERE account_id = 123;
